sentences.en: All these years, Eric had lived as a recluse.
sentences.cn: 这些年来, 埃里克都是过着隐士生活.

sentences.en: At that time the pub I enjoyed most was the Recluse Eaves.
sentences.cn: 那个时候,我最喜欢的是延长路平型关路口的清平檐.

sentences.en: Continuing negative criticism plunged him ever deeper into cynicism until he finally a recluse.
sentences.cn: 一些负面的评论使得他变得更为愤世嫉俗,最后终于使得他成为隐士.

sentences.en: For such a recluse and an introvert, this passion for closeness seems odd.
sentences.cn: 这么个独行内向的人居然这么热衷于接近什么,真是怪事.

sentences.en: Hence, some scholars would rather abandon political official career and content being a recluse.
sentences.cn: 于是, 有一部分名“道”的士,宁愿舍弃政治仕途而甘于成为“沉默”的隐士.

sentences.en: His widow became a virtual recluse for the remainder of her life.
sentences.cn: 他的寡妻孤寂地度过了余生。

sentences.en: Nancy: Well, suit yourself. I don't recommend turning down too many invitations or you'll get a reputation for being a recluse.
sentences.cn: 好吧，随你吧。我不建议你拒绝太多邀请，不然你会被别人当成一个隐居者（孤僻的人）

sentences.en: She became a recluse after her two sons were murdered.
sentences.cn: 两个儿子被杀后，她就一直离群索居。

sentences.en: Stained glass windows, ceramic chimney and floral motifs adorn the house and make it an awe inspiring space for recluse.
sentences.cn: 彩色玻璃窗户，陶瓷灯罩和花纹图案装饰的房子，让它对隐士来说成为一个令人敬畏的空间。

sentences.en: Terror of the lecher hope of the mad recluse: the sky! Black cover of the great cauldron in which boils vast imperceptible humanity.
sentences.cn: 纵欲者的恐惧，疯隐士的希望：天空！那口大锅的黑色盖子锅中沸煮着无数渺小的人类。

sentences.en: The old recluse secluded himself from the outside world.
sentences.cn: 这位老隐士与外面的世界隔绝了.

sentences.en: The old recluse was very cagey about her past life.
sentences.cn: 老隐士对自己过去的生活守口如瓶.
这位隐士不与任何人来往.

sentences.en: to lead the life of a recluse
Visitors who caught sight of him in New Hampshire where he lived described an unkempt recluse.
sentences.cn: 曾有访客在其居住地新罕布希尔州见过他,把他描绘成一位不修边幅的隐士.

trans.tran_en: someone who chooses to live alone, and does not like seeing or talking to other people
